name: Xetus
description:
For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 (Theme: Let There be Chaos)

Welcome to Xetus, Xetus is a chaotic 2D Fighting Game That you can play alone or with friends, where you choose and control a Mecha each with their own fighting style in a futuristic city, and you have to beat your opponent while undergoing attack from combat and destruction before the time runs out.

Currently, there are 2 characters:

  • Red, a mecha with giant fists on each hand, it's a punchy boy.
  • Purple (Coming Soon), a mecha with blades on each hand, it's the knife boy Controls you can change it on settings.

Controls:

  • LEFT & RIGHT                                 => A & D
  • DROP                                                   => S
  • LIGHT ATTACK                              => J+J+J+J
  • MEDIUM ATTACK                       => K+K+K+K
  • HEAVY ATTACK                            => L 
  • JUMP                                                    => Space
  • PAUSE                                                  => Esc

Note: Some features might not functional, we will work on them in future development.

Credits:

  • Joen TNT (Programmer, Project Manager)
